title: Disney Classics
description: Test your knowledge of classic Disney animated films!

questions.question: What was Disney's first full-length animated feature film?

options.text: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.explanation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937) was the first full-length cel animated feature in motion picture history!

questions.question: The Lion King takes place in Africa.
questions.explanation: The Lion King is set in the Pride Lands of Africa and was inspired by Shakespeare's Hamlet!

questions.question: In Aladdin, what is the Genie's lamp?
questions.explanation: The Genie lives in a magical oil lamp and grants three wishes to whoever rubs it!

questions.question: What species of animal is Bambi?
questions.explanation: Bambi is a white-tailed deer who grows up to become the Great Prince of the Forest!

questions.question: In The Little Mermaid, Ariel trades her voice for human legs.
questions.explanation: Ariel gives her beautiful voice to the sea witch Ursula in exchange for human legs to meet Prince Eric!

questions.question: How many dwarfs are there in Snow White?
questions.explanation: The seven dwarfs are Doc, Grumpy, Happy, Sleepy, Bashful, Sneezy, and Dopey!

questions.question: What does Pinocchio's nose do when he lies?
questions.explanation: Pinocchio's wooden nose grows whenever he tells a lie - a famous symbol of dishonesty!

questions.question: Dumbo is an elephant who can fly.
questions.explanation: Dumbo uses his oversized ears to fly, becoming the star of the circus despite being ridiculed for his big ears!
